name: 曾淑惠
objective:
研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其對學校評鑑相關議題的興趣，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in school evaluation. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in school evaluation.
